abstrac: Senior Full Stack Web Developer, Handling the Front and Back Ends of Web and Mobile Projects with Clean Codes.
bio:
If you need a seasoned developer with 10+ years of XP, who can code in a variety of languages, work with different SQL, NoSQL and Graph databases, setup cloud environments, deploy and support apps and even create documentations, I am the right guy for your next Web, Mobile, SaaS, Microservice and even IoT project.

I know how to develop software in a sustainable manner and I work with my teammates on big projects. Being a one man army is not always the best choice for software and hardware development.

I have a deep understanding of the Linux ecosystem and can setup and configure web servers, cloud environments, web control panels, firewalls and virtualized environments.

IoT and open hardware is my hobby and my passion and sometimes I combine my programming and Linux skills for the Internet of Things projects.

/*
 * My Skills and Expertise 
 */
# 🌎 check our website webdinavia.com
✅ BackEnd: PHP[CodeIgniter/SLIM/Symfony], NodeJS[Express], Python[Flask], LUA
✅ FrontEnd: React.js, Next.js, D3.js, jQuery
✅ Mobile: ReactNative, Cordova, Ionic, PWA
✅ Desktop: Electron/NodeJs
✅ Database: SQL, NoSQL[MongoDB/Firebase], Graph[Neo4j]
✅ UI/UX: Figma/Adobe[XD/Illustrator/Photoshop]
✅ Virtualization: Citrix Xen, VMWare, Esxi, KVM
✅ WebCP: DirectAdmin, cPanel, ISPConfig, CWP, CyberPanel
✅ Firewalls: pfSense, Kerio, CSF, APF
✅ Electrnic/IoT: Arduino, ESP, STM, RaspberryPi, Altium, Simetrix

/*
 * Other Services
 */
✅ Shopify, WordPress/WooCommerce, OpenCart, PrestaShop, Magento development and design
✅ WordPress theme customization, WordPress Plugin Development
✅ WordPress Speed Improvement
✅ Real Estate, Online booking system, CRM, CMS, LMS, TMS development
✅ Payment gateway integration, API development & integration
✅ Restful APIs, SOAP, GraphQL, Web-service Dev
✅ UI/UX Design, Graphic Design, Template Design and Development
✅ On-site Search Engine Optimization, Page-Speed Score Improvement, SEO Audit

You can communicate with me over Whatsapp, Skype, Gmail or project management sites like Trello/Slack. I prefer to discuss the different aspects of a project before starting it and also tracking the issues online.

I have setup a ticketing system and support portal for my clients.

🌐 https://webdinavia.com/

bio:
Video Expertz is a family owned creative digital and media agency. Our culture is rooted in a deep purpose to deliver success through Innovation, Simplicity and Agility. Our culture is focused towards producing outcomes for our clients, not outputs. We start with the core understanding on the requirements, and always put strategy before execution. We have worked with companies of all sizes. Our work is our footprint. It's our business, our passion, our calling, and our expertise. This is what we do.

We understand that presentation is everything. That is why we offer a wide range of graphic design services to help enhance your business's bottom line. We specialize in complete Web Videos, audio video productions, post productions 3d and 2d Animations, Graphics Design and Multimedia for web, broadcast and print media. We will bring your imagination to life in animation. From humble beginnings in 2012, We have grown into a full multimedia studio with talented designers and animators producing Web videos, TVC and 3D animation.

Whether you are looking for a graphic design or a animation company who can help with exhibition and marketing materials or brand identity conceptions and makeovers, we can assist you in meeting your goals.

Our Team :

Waqas Abbasi    ( Production Lead )
Ali Raza             ( Animation )
Faizan Arif         ( Animation )
Sohail Raza        ( 2D animation and Artwork )
Khurram Ahmed  ( 3D Modelling and Animation
Harris Hafeez      ( Video Editing and production )

- See more at:

bio:
As core SEO professionals with 10+ years of experience in Digital Marketing, we know how to take your business to the next level. We can be your one-stop-shop for all your digital needs like complete SEO working, PPC (Pay Per Click), Google Ads, Facebook and Instagram ads, ORM (Online Reputation Management), etc. 

Our motto is completely based on our client goal; moreover, we have evolved our working and strategies as per the latest White SEO methods. We deliver high-quality Search Engine Optimization that would be fruitful for your business, Social Engine Marketing.  

We understand and follow your needs and goals. We have worked for different niches of websites around the Globe with a work experience of 10+ years. So you can count on us and start your Digital Journey with us!

SEO Strategy - 
Every website is treated uniquely by search engines. Our SEO strategy is to start with relevant long-tail keywords with competitiveness according to the existing presence of your website, and then we will provide you on-page suggestions and off-page SEO practices according to those keywords. This will help in improving website ranking and its worth. After some work, we can gradually move towards higher competition and thus we will be gradually improving the overall organic presence of your website. This is an effective and long term SEO strategy that benefits most of the websites. And we charged on monthly basis. We have a successful track record of more than 10 years and it would be a great pleasure for us to work with you.
Open for hourly basis work or fixed price projects.

bio:
My name is Shalini and I am an expert QA and Product owner. I have 15 years of experience in QA and 1 year experience as Product owner. As Product owner I can write user stories, back log, Task distribution, prioritization of back log items, creating sprint, get screen designed, assign coding task to developers, assign task to QA and make project shippable.

As a Software QA professional, I believe Software Testing as "Destructive Creation" and I enjoy finding issues by hook or by crook.   I am not only a tester who can do just some testing work and report issues, I can also help you in process initiation, automation tool selection, resource hiring, QA documentation such as help documents, test plan, knowledge transfer doc, training material. 

 Having expertise in automated testing using selenium java IDE, Webdriver, watir,ANT, junit, TestNG, testingbot.com.  I have worked on application based on several domain and technology such as Healthcare, e-commerce, e-learning, business intelligence, enterprises, social media, CRM,Gaming,VOIP, POS, Accounting. These application were based on .net, java, php, joomla, wordpress etc.

bio:
I am a qualified CPA & ACCA member with 5+ years of professional experience in accounting, finance, audit, and taxation. My academic background includes an MSc in International Accounting & Analytics from NUI Galway and a BSc (Hons) from Oxford Brooks University. I hold certifications in Strategic Management, Xero ProAdvisor, QuickBooks ProAdvisor, and Advanced Excel (Kubicle).

Throughout my career, I have held various roles such as Senior Accountant at Base Practice Support, Accounts Officer at CareCloud, Audit Associate at Khurram Aziz & Co Chartered Accountants, and Audit Assistant at Fariha & Co Chartered Accountants. Some of my key areas of expertise include:

• Financial accounting and reporting
• Taxation, including VAT and corporation tax preparation
• Audit planning, Risk assessment, Control testing, Analytical and Substantive testing
• Budgeting and forecasting
• Bookkeeping and payables management
• Proficiency in IFRS, FRS, and US GAAP
• Technical skills in accounting software, such as Oracle ERP, Quickbooks, Xero, SAGE 
  cloud, MS Dynamics DAV & 365 Business Central, and VT Transactions
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Strong team player with a commitment to knowledge sharing and development

Overall, I am a highly skilled and dedicated accounting and finance professional with a proven track record of success in various roles.I am a qualified ACCA member with
99% client satisfaction rate, Supreme level work quality from my team of Accountants

abstrac: "Wonderful" Boston Globe / "Amazing" Palm Beach Media Associates
bio:
Tom Kerr has been a full-time, award-winning professional writer and editor for 10+ years. He has served as a senior editor for international digital publishers; a newspaper and magazine journalist; and a blogger and content creator. Tom has also worked as a brand strategist and a business communications consultant. His client list includes individuals, small businesses, nonprofits, and Fortune 500s across a wide diversity of professions and sectors.

References and writing samples are available by request. Please contact through GURU for more information, or visit Tom's website: tomkerrwriter.com

Please contact me via GURU for more information and to collaborate on your projects. For more about me, please visit my website: tomkerrwriter.com
Thank you.
